pageContent.title: Well Done
pageContent.descriptionText:
Well Done"You are on the right track. The first question you ask Dr. Cardonza should be one that opens the conversation around departmental and patient treatment goals that Dr. Cardonza is trying to achieve. This results question begins to create a foundation for aligning Samsca with the department’s patient treatment goals, which is the best beginning point for becoming a trusted advisor.

Whenever you begin the prescribing process with a consideration of the department’s treatment goals, it enhances your ability to advance the prescribing cycle."
